title: The Cleveland Mysteries Vol. 1: The Lost Rubies
description: In attendance at a friend's wedding, six teenagers figure it's just another normal weekend trip, but when the bride's priceless rubies are stolen, the homeschoolers suddenly find themselves smack in the middle of an investigation. But which mystery will prove the more dangerous in the long run; the rubies, or their mysterious companion Ambrose Donahue?
author: Elaine J. Dalton
